components.common.languagepicker.acknowl: **The selected language translation is fully provided by the community**. EMURGO is grateful to all those who have contributed
components.delegationsummary.delegatedSt: If you just delegated to a new stake pool, it may take a couple of minutes for the network to process your request.
components.delegationsummary.failedwalle: Some users experienced problems while upgrading their wallets in the Shelley testnet.
If you observed an unexpected zero balance after having upgraded your wallet, we recommend you to restore your wallet once again. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
components.delegationsummary.notDelegate: You have not delegated your ADA yet.
Go to the Staking Center to choose which stake pool you want to delegate to. Note that you may delegate only to one stake pool.
components.delegationsummary.upcomingRew: Note that after you delegate to a stake pool, you will need to wait until the end of the current epoch, plus two additional epochs, before you start receiving rewards.
components.delegationsummary.warningbann: The last ITN rewards were distributed on epoch 190. Rewards can be claimed on mainnet once Shelley is released on mainnet.
Your ITN wallet rewards and balance may not be correctly displayed, but this information is still securely stored in the ITN blockchain.

agar akses lebih cepat dan mudah

components.settings.removewalletscreen.d: If you really wish to permanently delete the wallet, make sure you have written down your 15-word recovery phrase.
To confirm this operation, type the wallet name below.
components.settings.removewalletscreen.h: I have written down the recovery phrase of this wallet and understand that I cannot recover the wallet without it.
components.settings.settingsscreen.faqDe: If you are experiencing issues, please see the FAQ on Yoroi website for guidance on known issues.
components.settings.settingsscreen.repor: Jika FAQ tidak menyelesaikan masalah yang Anda alami, silakan gunakan fitur permintaan Dukungan kami.
components.settings.settingsscreen.title: Dukungan
components.settings.toggleeasyconfirmati: By disabling this option, you will be able to spend your ADA only with your master password.

This option will allow you to send ADA transactions from your wallet by simply confirming with fingerprint or facial recognition (with a standard system fallback option). This makes your wallet less secure. This is a compromise between UX and security!
Harap ingat kata sandi master Anda, karena Anda mungkin memerlukannya jika data biometrik Anda dihapus dari perangkat.
components.stakingcenter.confirmDelegati: Current approximation of rewards that you will receive per epoch:
components.stakingcenter.noPoolDataDialo: The data from the stake pool(s) you selected is invalid. Please try again
components.stakingcenter.poolwarningmoda: Purposely excludes transactions from blocks (censoring the network)
Based on network activity, it seems this pool:
Creates multiple blocks in the same slot (purposely causing forks)
We suggest contacting the pool owner through the stake pool's webpage to ask about their behavior. Remember, you can change your delegation at any time without any interruptions in rewards.
Causes some unknown issue (look online for more info)
components.stakingcenter.title: Staking Center
components.txhistory.flawedwalletmodal.e: It looks like you have accidentally created or restored a wallet that is only included in special versions for development. As a security measure, we have disabled this wallet.
You still can create a new wallet or restore one without restrictions. If you were affected in some way by this issue, please contact EMURGO.
components.txhistory.txhistory.warningba: The Shelley protocol upgrade adds a new Shelley wallet type which supports delegation. To delegate your ADA you will need to upgrade to a Shelley wallet.
components.txhistory.txhistory.syncError: Kami mengalami masalah sinkronisasi. Tarik ke bawah untuk memulai ulang
components.uikit.offlinebanner.offline: Anda sedang offline. Harap periksa pengaturan pada perangkat anda.
components.walletinit.connectnanox.check: Before continuing, please make sure that:
Learn more about using Yoroi with Ledger
components.walletinit.connectnanox.conne: An error occurred while trying to connect with your hardware wallet:
Action needed: Please, export public key from your Ledger device.
components.walletinit.createwallet.mnemo: Saya mengerti bahwa secret key saya disimpan dengan aman hanya pada perangkat ini, tidak pada server lain
I understand that if this application is moved to another device or deleted, my funds can be only recovered with the backup phrase that I have written down and saved in a secure place.
Ketuk setiap kata dalam urutan yang benar untuk memverifikasi frasa pemulihan Anda

Pada layar berikut, Anda akan melihat satu set 15 kata acak. Ini adalah **frase pemulihan wallet** Anda. Ini dapat dimasukkan dalam versi Yoroi apa saja untuk mencadangkan atau mengembalikan dana wallet dan private key Anda.
Make sure **nobody is looking at your screen** unless you want them to have access to your funds.
Harap pastikan Anda telah menyalin frasa pemulihan dengan hati-hati di tempat yang aman. Anda perlu frasa ini untuk menggunakan dan mengembalikan wallet Anda. Frasa peka terhadap huruf besar-kecil.
components.walletinit.restorewallet.rest: To restore your wallet, please provide the recovery phrase generated when you created your wallet for the first time.
Please enter a valid recovery phrase.
components.walletinit.restorewallet.upgr: Do you want to check if your wallet needs to be upgraded?
If you had ADA in your wallet on November 29th, 2019, you will need to upgrade to a new wallet format called a "reward wallet" for compatibility with Shelley.
Your wallet did not need to be upgraded.
components.walletinit.restorewallet.wall: Make sure the Byron wallet address matches your old wallet.
If you entered the wrong recovery phrase, you will get an empty wallet with different addresses from your old one.
components.walletinit.verifyrestoredwall: Make sure your wallet account checksum and icon match what you remember.
Make sure the address(es) match what you remember
If you’ve entered wrong mnemonics you will just open another empty wallet with wrong account checksum and wrong addresses.
crypto.keystore.subtitle: Anda bisa menonaktifkan fitur ini kapan saja pada pengaturan
global.actions.dialogs.apiError.message: Error received from API method call while sending transaction. Please try again later or check our Twitter account (https://twitter.com/YoroiWallet)
global.actions.dialogs.apiError.title: API error
global.actions.dialogs.biometricsIsTurne: It seems that you turned off biometrics. Please turn it on
global.actions.dialogs.disableEasyConfir: Harap nonaktifkan fungsi konfirmasi mudah pada semua wallet anda terlebih dahulu
global.actions.dialogs.enableFingerprint: Anda harus mengaktifkan biometric pada perangkat anda terlebih dahulu agar bisa menautkannya dengan aplikasi ini
global.actions.dialogs.enableSystemAuthF: You probably disabled the lock screen on your phone. You need to disable easy transaction confirmation first. Please set up you lock screen (PIN / Password / Pattern) on your phone and then restart application. After this action you should be able to disable the lock screen on your phone and use this application
global.actions.dialogs.generalError.mess: Operasi yang diminta gagal. Ini yang kami ketahui: {message}
global.actions.dialogs.hwConnectionError: An error occurred while trying to connect with your hardware wallet. Please, make sure you are following the steps correctly. Restarting your hardware wallet may also fix the problem.
global.actions.dialogs.incorrectPassword: Kata sandi yang anda berikan salah.
global.actions.dialogs.itnNotSupported.m:
Wallets created during the Incentivized Testnet (ITN) are no longer operative.
If you would like to claim your rewards, we will update Yoroi Mobile as well as Yoroi Desktop in the next couple of weeks.
global.actions.dialogs.itnNotSupported.t: The Cardano ITN (Rewards Testnet) has finalized
global.actions.dialogs.logout.title: Logout
global.actions.dialogs.insufficientBalan: Not enough funds to make this transaction
global.actions.dialogs.networkError.mess: Kesalahan yang berkaitan dengan koneksi ke server. Periksalah koneksi internet anda
global.actions.dialogs.notSupportedError: This feature is not yet supported. It will be enabled in a future release.
global.actions.dialogs.pinMismatch.title: PIN tidak valid
global.actions.dialogs.walletKeysInvalid: We detected that biometrics in phone changed. As a result, the easy transaction confirmation was disabled and transaction submitting is allowed only with master password. You can re-enable easy transactions confirmation in settings
global.actions.dialogs.walletStateInvali: Your wallet is in an inconsistent state. You may solve this by restoring your wallet with your recovery phrase. Please contact EMURGO support to report this issue as this may help us fix the problem in a future release.
global.error.walletNameAlreadyTaken: Kamu sudah mempunyai wallet dengan nama ini
global.error.walletNameTooLong: Nama wallet tidak boleh melebihi dari 40 huruf
global.ledgerMessages.appInstalled: Cardano ADA app is installed on your Ledger device.
global.ledgerMessages.appOpened: Cardano ADA app must remain open on your Ledger device.
global.ledgerMessages.bluetoothEnabled: Bluetooth is enabled on your smartphone.
global.ledgerMessages.bluetoothDisabledE: Bluetooth is disabled in your smartphone
global.ledgerMessages.connectionError: An error occurred while trying to connect with your hardware wallet. Please, make sure you are following the steps correctly. Restarting your hardware wallet may also fix the problem.
global.ledgerMessages.connectUsb: Connect your Ledger device through your smartphone's USB port using your OTG adapter.
global.ledgerMessages.enterPin: Power on your ledger device and enter your PIN.
global.ledgerMessages.haveOTGAdapter: You have an on-the-go adapter allowing you to connect your Ledger device with your smartphone using a USB cable.
global.ledgerMessages.keepUsbConnected: Make sure your device remains connected until the operation is completed.
global.ledgerMessages.locationEnabled: Location is enabled on your device. Android requires location to be enabled to provide access to Bluetooth, but EMURGO will never store any location data.
global.ledgerMessages.openApp: Open Cardano ADA app on the Ledger device.
global.ledgerMessages.usbAlwaysConnected: Your Ledger device remains connected through USB until the process is completed.
global.network.syncErrorBannerTextWithRe: We are experiencing synchronization issues. Pull to refresh
